title.narrative: Country Programme 200119 „Community Household Resilience-Building and Disaster Risk Reduction Project" in Gitega, Kayanza and Karuzi Provinces
Country Programme 200119 „Community Household Resilience-Building and Disaster Risk Reduction Project" in Gitega, Kayanza and Karuzi Provinces

description.narrative: By the programme vulnerable sections of the population should attain food security. The following components are planned 1) school supplies for pre and basic school children, 2) Nutrition measures for pregnant and satisfying women, children of 6 to 23 months as well as HIV/AIDS patients in treatment, as well as 3) measures for the rural development at local level. All together 75,000 people are supported more than 60 months.

Durch das Programm sollen vulnerable Bevölkerungsgruppen Ernährungssicherheit erlangen. Folgende Komponenten sind vorgesehen 1) Schulspeisungen für Vor- und Grundschulkinder, 2) Nutrition-Maßnahmen für schwangere und stillende Frauen, Kinder von 6 bis 23 Monaten sowie HIV/AIDS-Patienten in Behandlung, sowie 3) Maßnahmen zur ländlichen Entwicklung auf Gemeindeebene. Insgesamt werden 75.000 Menschen über 60 Monate lang unterstützt.
